text: Yeh tallaqen do martaba hain phir ya to achai say rokna ya umdagi kay sath chor dena aur tumhen halal nahi kay tum ney unhen jo dey diya hai uss mein say kuch bhi lo haan yeh aur baat hai kay dono ko Allah ki hudood qaeem na rakh sakney ka khof ho iss liye agar tumhen darr ho kay yeh dono Allah ki haden qaeem na rakh saken gay to aurat rehaee paney kay liye kuch dey dalay iss mein dono per gunah nahi yeh Allah ki hudood hain khabardar inn say aagay na barhna aur jo log Allah ki haddon say tajawuz ker jayen woh zalim hain
